name: dlm-js
description: JavaScript re-implementation of the MATLAB dlm library using jax-js-nonconsuming

scripts.gen:svg:nile: npx tsx scripts/gen-niledemo-svg.ts scan && npx tsx scripts/gen-niledemo-svg.ts assoc
scripts.gen:svg:kaisaniemi: npx tsx scripts/gen-kaisaniemi-svg.ts scan && npx tsx scripts/gen-kaisaniemi-svg.ts assoc
scripts.gen:svg:trigar: npx tsx scripts/gen-trigar-svg.ts scan && npx tsx scripts/gen-trigar-svg.ts assoc
scripts.gen:svg:nile-mle-anim: npx tsx scripts/collect-nile-mle-frames.ts && npx tsx scripts/gen-nile-mle-anim-svg.ts scan && npx tsx scripts/gen-nile-mle-anim-svg.ts assoc && deno run --unstable-webgpu --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-run scripts/collect-nile-mle-frames-webgpu.ts && npx tsx scripts/gen-nile-mle-anim-svg.ts webgpu
scripts.gen:svg:energy-mle: npx tsx scripts/collect-energy-mle-frames.ts && npx tsx scripts/gen-energy-mle-anim-svg.ts scan && npx tsx scripts/gen-energy-mle-anim-svg.ts assoc && deno run --unstable-webgpu --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-run scripts/collect-energy-mle-frames-webgpu.ts && npx tsx scripts/gen-energy-mle-anim-svg.ts webgpu
scripts.gen:svg:ozone: npx tsx scripts/gen-ozone-svg.ts scan && npx tsx scripts/gen-ozone-svg.ts assoc
scripts.gen:svg:missing: npx tsx scripts/gen-missing-svg.ts scan && npx tsx scripts/gen-missing-svg.ts assoc
scripts.gen:svg:fit: pnpm run gen:svg:nile && pnpm run gen:svg:kaisaniemi && pnpm run gen:svg:trigar && pnpm run gen:svg:ozone && pnpm run gen:svg:missing && pnpm run update:timings
scripts.gen:svg: pnpm run gen:svg:nile && pnpm run gen:svg:kaisaniemi && pnpm run gen:svg:trigar && pnpm run gen:svg:nile-mle-anim && pnpm run gen:svg:energy-mle && pnpm run gen:svg:ozone && pnpm run gen:svg:missing && pnpm run update:timings
scripts.bench:mle: npx tsx scripts/collect-mle-benchmark.ts && pnpm run update:timings
scripts.bench:checkpoint: npx tsx scripts/bench-checkpoint.ts && pnpm run update:timings
scripts.bench:backends: npx tsx scripts/bench-backends.ts && pnpm run update:timings
scripts.bench:wasm: pnpm run gen:svg:fit && npx tsx scripts/collect-nile-mle-frames.ts && npx tsx scripts/gen-nile-mle-anim-svg.ts scan && npx tsx scripts/gen-nile-mle-anim-svg.ts assoc && npx tsx scripts/collect-energy-mle-frames.ts && npx tsx scripts/gen-energy-mle-anim-svg.ts scan && npx tsx scripts/gen-energy-mle-anim-svg.ts assoc && pnpm run bench:backends && pnpm run bench:mle && pnpm run bench:checkpoint && pnpm run update:timings
scripts.test:octave: octave-cli --no-gui tests/octave/niledemo.m && octave-cli --no-gui tests/octave/gensys_tests.m && octave-cli --no-gui tests/octave/kaisaniemi_demo.m && octave-cli --no-gui tests/octave/ozonedemo.m && octave-cli --no-gui tests/octave/missingdata_test.m
scripts.test: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test:octave && pnpm run test:node
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run build && pnpm run test
